known_issues: Deployment/build process encountered an error; user requested a retry.

existing_features.title: Fix the project build/deployment failure so the app can successfully build and deploy (backend canister + frontend assets) without errors.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove admin-role management and any admin-only moderation functionality from the Motoko backend canister API so the product no longer exposes admin controls via the canister interface.

projectName: Retry deployment by fixing build errors and removing backend admin-role functionality
